title: Dirty Ties
description: "Masterfully written, Dirty Ties is full of mystery and suspense, twists you never saw coming and a very satisfying, but unconventional romance." ~ Book BuddiesRevenge. I race to finance it. I evade to protect it. I kill to attain it. I planned everything. Except her. The alluring, curvaceous blonde at the finish line. With sapphire eyes that cheat and lie. Whose powerful family murdered mine. I hate her. I want her. I know sheâ€™s hiding something. But so am I.
author: Pam Godwin
